poem:
"Art: A Healing Pulse"

A splash of color,
a stroke of life,
awakening pleasure
in neural strobes.
Our minds, galleries,
we curate, connect by sharing,
find energy in seeing.
The director's sentiments echo in crimson and cobalt,
our souls uplifted,
by the hushed whispers
of a canvas.
